titleStmt.title: The state of the Philadelphian Society the grounds of their proceedings consider'd, in answer to a letter from Philalethes, upon occasion of the Theosophical transactions &c., to a member of that society.
titleStmt.author: Lee, Francis, 1661-1719.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the Booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Advertisement: "Books lately published by some of the Philadelphian Society", p. [31]-32.
Error in paging: p. 31 lacks number.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
